qa_analysis_summary.scope: Critical security and functionality issues only

verified_findings.description: Default JWT secret key is being used
verified_findings.steps_to_reproduce:
1. Check settings.jwt_secret_key value
2. Verify it's not the default
verified_findings.observed_output: JWT secret is default value: your-secret-key-change-in-production
verified_findings.expected_output: Unique, secure random JWT secret key

verified_findings.description: Rate limiting not functioning - no 429 responses after 10 rapid requests
verified_findings.steps_to_reproduce: 1. for i in {1..10}; do curl http://localhost:5000/api/v1/search?q=test$i; done
